name: Sylvester and Tweety in Cagey Capers
name_original: Sylvester and Tweety in Cagey Capers
description: Sylvester and Tweety in Cagey Capers is a 2D platform video game featuring the Looney Tunes characters Sylvester and Tweety. It was released for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive console in 1994 and was the first video game to star Sylvester and Tweety.
